mapper.select: SELECT USEREMAIL, USERNAME, PASSWD, STATUS, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, CITY, STATE, ZIP, COUNTRY, PHONE, BIRTH, CREATED, UPDATED FROM FM_MEMBER WHERE USEREMAIL = #{useremail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FM_MEMBER ( USEREMAIL, USERNAME, PASSWD, STATUS, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, CITY, STATE, ZIP, COUNTRY, PHONE, BIRTH, CREATED) VALUES ( #{useremail}, #{username}, #{passwd}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
